channel.title: Using the correct forum? Please read this first
channel.description:
This sub-forum is dedicated to answering support questions [b]only[/b] about the KVM hypervisor.
The hypervisor is a layer below the OS and therefore invisible to the OS and applications on top and does not affect them.
General questions about GNU/Linux or Whonix support should be posted in their respective sub-forums.
